summary: I BOUGHT A 2016 YUKON DENALI ON 8/8/2017.  I WAS NOTIFIED ON AUGUST 9, 2016 THAT MY 2007 YUKON DENALI WAS INCLUDED IN THE TAKATA AIRBAG RECALL.  GMC DID NOT NOTIFY ME ABOUT THE RECALL IN A TIMELY MANNER.  I WOULD NOT HAVE PURCHASED THE 2016 VEHICLE. GMC HAS NOT FIXED THE 2007.  I CANNOT SELL IT.
